title: 'Gteat fragrance soap'
body: 'I just loved the fragerance of these soaps
column5: and the deal i got on amazon was amazing and the soap really refreshens me. But after using it for a month i have realised that it is not that long lasting. The soap completely get used in a week whereas my other soaps last atleast 10-12 days
column6: hence it is not that long lasting. Overally its a decent soap from park avenue'

title: 'Aroma and freshness.'
body: 'We use old Cinthol as our bath soap.For a change this time we purchased this. Happy with the purchase. Especially a shower before bed gives a great refreshment. üëç'

title: 'Awesomeüòç'
body: The Park Avenue Pure Luxury Soap Pack of 4 (500g each) feels incredibly soft on the skin, leaving it smooth and refreshed. These bars are long-lasting, and you get great value for your money with four bars in a pack. It's a skincare product that's both gentle and budget-friendly.

title: 'Good morning'
